document_data.name: ''Wand of Conjuration''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''wand of conjuration''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[wand]] that allowed the wielder to recognize any [[conjuration]] [[spell]].<ref name="DMG2R-p210>
document_data.Powers: By simply grasping this wand the wielder was able to recognize any written or seen conjuration spell. The wielder could expend one of the wand's charges to cast ''[[unseen servant]]'' or ''[[monster summoning]]''. The wand could also be used to conjure a curtain of pure blackness that absorbed all light. The curtain could attain a maximum size of {{SI|600|sq ft}} but needed to reach from floor to ceiling and wall to wall wherever it was placed. A ''[[prismatic sphere]]'' could also be created with the wand, with a single color of the sphere appearing at a time from red to violet.
document_data.Notable Owners: [[Adnan al-Raqi]], a notorious [[sha'ir]] from [[Huzuz]], carried a ''wand of conjuration''.
